name: Wang & Feldman 2024 Tactile Coding in Cntnap2-/- Mice
citation: Feldman, Dan (2024) Wang & Feldman 2024 Tactile Coding in Cntnap2-/- Mice (Version draft) [Data set]. DANDI archive. https://dandiarchive.org/dandiset/001091/draft
description: This is optophysiology data for whisker tactile coding in mouse S1 cortex in Control and Cntnap2-/- mice.  This is the data reported in Han Chin Wang & Daniel E. Feldman, "Degraded tactile coding in the Cntnap2 mouse model of autism", Cell Reports 2024.
